sidebar.heading: Get Started
sidebar.paragraph: Connecting your wallet is similar to “logging in” to an application. Select your wallet from the options to get started.

selectingWallet.recommendedWalletsPart2: on this platform. Please use or install one of the supported wallets to continue
selectingWallet.installWallet: You do not have any wallets installed that {app} supports, please use a supported wallet

sidebar.paragraph: Please approve the connection in your wallet and authorize access to continue.

connectingWallet.warningText: {app} is waiting for you to connect your wallet, try manually connecting through your wallet menu

sidebar.paragraph: Your wallet is now connected to {app}

switch.heading: Switch Chain
switch.paragraph1: {app} requires that you switch your wallet to the {nextNetworkName} network to continue.
switch.paragraph2: *Some wallets may not support changing networks. If you can not change networks in your wallet you may consider switching to a different wallet.
